Description: BASIC FUNCTIONS1.1 Carries out analyses on all Refinery samples such as crude oils, intermediate and finished petroleum products, utility and process water samples, lube oil samples, scales and sludges from different units, corrosion products, catalysts, process chemicals, industrial wastes, effluent water, samples related with environmental pollution control, gases, granulated sulphur, Steam Water Cycle (Area 10) water samples and other related substances. 1.2 Follows standard test methods adopting wet chemistry techniques and state-of-the-art technology, in conjunction with sophisticated, computerized Laboratory equipment requiring computer literacy, special skills, care and experience, for plant control, quality control, product certification, corrosion control etc. 1.3 Supervises the work performed by Samplemen. Acts for Senior Lab. Technician during his absence.Skills
Skills: 1. Diploma in Analytical Chemistry or equivalent qualification.
2. 4 years experience in Petroleum Refinery and Power Plant Laboratory and familiarity with advanced computerized Laboratory equipment.
1.a. Secondary High School Certificate offering Science subjects.
2.b. 8 years Petroleum Refinery Laboratory experience & Power Plants and familiarity with advanced Computerized Laboratory equipment.
